                               5951                 :                : /*
                               5952                 :                :  * Return the action to be taken for the given transaction. See
                               5953                 :                :  * TransApplyAction for information on each of the actions.
                               5954                 :                :  *
                               5955                 :                :  * *winfo is assigned to the destination parallel worker info when the leader
                               5956                 :                :  * apply worker has to pass all the transaction's changes to the parallel
                               5957                 :                :  * apply worker.
                               5958                 :                :  */
                               5959                 :                : static TransApplyAction
                               5960                 :         326211 : get_transaction_apply_action(TransactionId xid, ParallelApplyWorkerInfo **winfo)
                               5961                 :                : {
                               5962                 :         326211 :     *winfo = NULL;
                               5963                 :                : 
                               5964         [ +  + ]:         326211 :     if (am_parallel_apply_worker())
                               5965                 :                :     {
                               5966                 :          68912 :         return TRANS_PARALLEL_APPLY;
                               5967                 :                :     }
                               5968                 :                : 
                               5969                 :                :     /*
                               5970                 :                :      * If we are processing this transaction using a parallel apply worker
                               5971                 :                :      * then either we send the changes to the parallel worker or if the worker
                               5972                 :                :      * is busy then serialize the changes to the file which will later be
                               5973                 :                :      * processed by the parallel worker.
                               5974                 :                :      */
                               5975                 :         257299 :     *winfo = pa_find_worker(xid);
                               5976                 :                : 
  952                          5977   [ +  +  +  + ]:         257299 :     if (*winfo && (*winfo)->serialize_changes)
                               5978                 :                :     {
                               5979                 :           5037 :         return TRANS_LEADER_PARTIAL_SERIALIZE;
                               5980                 :                :     }
                               5981         [ +  + ]:         252262 :     else if (*winfo)
                               5982                 :                :     {
                               5983                 :          68896 :         return TRANS_LEADER_SEND_TO_PARALLEL;
                               5984                 :                :     }
                               5985                 :                : 
                               5986                 :                :     /*
                               5987                 :                :      * If there is no parallel worker involved to process this transaction
                               5988                 :                :      * then we either directly apply the change or serialize it to a file
                               5989                 :                :      * which will later be applied when the transaction finish message is
                               5990                 :                :      * processed.
                               5991                 :                :      */
                               5992         [ +  + ]:         183366 :     else if (in_streamed_transaction)
